Finishing Up The LC Events...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): The Locker Room (Q&A): Finishing Up The LC Events...
By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 6, 2004 - 07:57 pm:

I will try to finish up the outstanding LC events. For the events with odd numbers of entrants, like the MR3 Master's level (which has 2 entrants in bracket 3), I will battle off whatever is entered, then take that champion and enter it in a finale. So the MR3 Master's would involve me assigning someone to hold a showdown between me and Torey, then the winner of that event would face the winners of bracket 1 and 2, producing a champion. Hope this plan is ok with everyone.

I expect events to start happening within the week, as soon as I get some saves. (If anyone has Velo's MR2 Master's entry, please email me!)
